news.title: Mia Griffin to be the first Irish women to compete in Tour de France Femmes
news.summary: Griffin is fresh off of her win at the Irish Elite National Championship.

news.title: David Keenan announces new single '50 Quid Man'
news.summary: The new single will come out Friday and can be pre-ordered below.

news.title: Cillian Murphy starring Steve to premiere at Toronto International Film Festival
news.summary: Steve will be released in Ireland on September 19.

news.title: Marcus Mumford praises Ireland's musical legacy: "I don’t think ever has a nation of this size produced so many impactful artists”
news.summary: Check out the latest rapid fire Q&A with Marcus Mumford before Mumford & Sons' Malahide Castle gig below

news.title: Irish Museum of Modern Art denies censorship accusations after removing film with gay kiss
news.summary: IMMA said they "are dismayed at the current supposition that we would actively censor the work of Derek Jarman and/or any artist from the LGBTQ+ community."

news.title: Live Report: Natasha Bedingfield treats Iveagh Gardens with a set full of hits and classic covers
news.summary: The 43-year-old pop singer hasn't released a new album since 2019 but she still found a way to captivate the crowd.

news.title: Dublin rocker ALKY releases new single ‘Another Piece Of Me’
news.summary: Barry Reid—an audio engineer by trade—started writing and recording his own music last year

news.title: KNEECAP's DJ Próvaí donates coffee cart to hometown GAA club
Spotify removes AI-generated music from deceased artists' profiles
news.summary: A report by 404 Media found that AI-generated tracks appeared on Blaze Foley's and Guy Clark's Spotify pages that have since been removed

news.title: Tallaght Stands Against Racism demonstration announced following assault of Indian man
news.summary: "Our local community will be taking a stand against this attack"
